name: UAIPerceptionStimuliSourceComponent
doc: Gives owning actor a way to auto-register as perception system's sense stimuli source

methods.name: RegisterForSense
methods.doc: Registers owning actor as source for specified sense class

methods.name: RegisterWithPerceptionSystem
methods.doc:
Registers owning actor as source of stimuli for senses specified in RegisterAsSourceForSenses.
    Note that you don't have to do it if bAutoRegisterAsSource == true

methods.name: UnregisterFromPerceptionSystem
methods.doc: Unregister owning actor from being a source of sense stimuli

methods.name: UnregisterFromSense
methods.doc: Unregisters owning actor from sources list of a specified sense class
